description.value:
You've learned to apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks.

When you have @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.classfeatures.Panache]{Panache}, you apply your @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.classfeatures.Precise Strike]{Precise Strike} damage on ranged Strikes you make with a thrown weapon within that weapon's first range increment. The thrown weapon must be an agile or finesse weapon.

This also allows you to make a thrown weapon ranged Strike for @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.classfeatures.Confident Finisher]{Confident Finisher} and any other finisher that includes a Strike that can benefit from your precise strike.
